casebody.data:
No. 10-9767. Steven Jude Hoffenberg, Petitioner v. United States. 563 U.S. 970, 131 S. Ct. 2171,

179 L. Ed. 2d 953,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3221. April 25, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor and Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
